question.title: Would you rather kill your friend or your brother?
question.brother: Seem's like you care about your brother more than that friend of yours. Good Brother!
question.friend: Huh are you insane. Why do you hate your brother who doesn't leave you at all times while your friend just comes and go. Remember family stays forever!

question.title: Would you rather save a cat or save a dog
question.brother: A cat seems decent since it is cute!
question.friend: SEems like dogs mighht even bite you!

question.title: Would you rather die for your friend or your teacher
question.brother: A teacher seems to be nice but sometimes give's too much homework that you just hate the teacher!
question.friend: Friends help you a lot with homework and more so why not a friend :D !
